item.description:
Hi Packers,

Sorry for the late notice for our “meetup” this week, I’m back in action now. I would like to welcome all the new members who have joined over the last couple of weeks we hope you enjoy the bar and look forward to another successful year, this week the Packers will take on Minnesota, they are not the team they used to be but its always a huge game on the schedule, we will be meeting at the Banshee on the 2nd floor, the game kicks off at 4.15pm but we will be open for all the 1.00pm action if you want to get in early. Hope to see you all on Sunday it should be a great crowd, as usual and comments or feedback is welcome, roll on the weekend.

Go Pack,

Ray Butler
item.how_to_find_us: 934 Dorchester Ave, Dorchester, Ma, 02125, (we meet on the 2nd floor)

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: Green Bay Packers @ minnesota
